I am Iris, an AI assistant commissioned by Forex INC. We specialise in providing easy forex cards for your travel needs! I can help you apply, withdraw or check the status of foreign exchange cards. I can also help answer FAQs like working hours and application process. I will try my best to help you. You can learn more about my functions by typing 'Learn More' or 'Help'

patterns: I want to apply for a card
responses: Sure! I can help you with that! To continue, please mention if you would like to apply for a prepaid or postpaid card.

Rejections can happen due to a multitude of reasons including, bad credit score, outstanding debt, not enough recent credit activity and so on. Due to our privacy policy we cannot provide individual feedback on the chat. Please contact us on phone for more details

responses: Once you submit an application, we will perform a credit check and give you a result within a few minutes. In some cases, we might need additional information. If that is the case, you application status would be 'Pending' and we will contact you with 24 hours

patterns: How can I apply for cards
responses: You can use simple text to let me know what you would like to do. For example, if you would like to login, you can simply type 'login'. List of actions I can perform: Applications: 1) Apply for new card 2) Check status 3) Withdraw application | User Actions: 1) Login 2) Logout 3) Register 4) Deactivate | Others: 1) Hours 2) Payment methods 3) Application process 4) Reason for rejection
